name: EggTest|howtotellifeggsarefresh
0:
”Alexa, start egg test.”
”Alexa, ask Egg Test up or down.”
”Alexa, tell Egg Test the egg floats.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: egg test
Developer Terms of Use
des:
It's sunday morning. I'm excited for my egg breakfast. But: are the eggs still good to eat? I better do the egg test...

But should the egg float to the top or should it lay at its side on the bottom? I am not sure.

=> Just ask the Egg Test skill!

Do you want a short answer:
- Alexa, ask Egg Test "up or down"
- Alexa, tell Egg Test the egg floats to the top
- Alexa, tell Egg Test the egg lays at the bottom

Do you want to know more details:
- Alexa, start Egg Test!
- Test instructions!
- Why does this method work?


>>> Enjoy your meal!

---------------------------------------------
Warning: This skill is for your information only. We are not responsible for whether your eggs are fresh or already spoiled. The information of this skill is no health advice. If in doubt, dispose the eggs rather than spoiling your stomach.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
